name: Sentinel's Path
description:
This is my very first game, which was inspired by League of Legends, especially character called Senna and her lore. As you could understand, you play as Senna and you must kill wraiths who get in the way.

Current version

Game version is 0.01 and currently it's only demo, but I planning to continue develop this game and add next things:

  • Load&Save
  • Some story
  • Boss
  • Main character's abilities
  • Level up system
  • Some other things

And I will appreciate if you support me

Controls

A - move left, D - move right

W - jump

Space - shoot

R - respawn

Esc - open menu
